debates.showAs: Children’s Health (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Children’s Health Act 2018 and therefore to amend the National Paediatric Hospital Development Board (Establishment) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 246 of 2007) so as to direct that the National Children’s Hospital be named Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte Leanaí, 2018 agus, dá bhrí sin, do leasú an Ordaithe um Bord Forbartha an Ospidéil Náisiúnta Phéidiatraicigh (Bunú), 2007 (I.R. Uimh. 246 de 2007) d’fhonn a threorú go dtabharfar Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí ar Ospidéal Náisiúnta na Leanaí.
bill.shortTitleEn: Children’s Health (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte Leanaí (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Leasú), 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electricity Regulation Act 1999 to give the Commission for the Regulation of Utilities (CRU) the legislative remit to effectively monitor wholesale and retail prices in the energy market; to increase the frequency and level of reporting; to effectively monitor and regulate hedging practices; to strengthen the Commission's powers to monitor anti-competitive behaviour of gas and electricity suppliers; to expand the Commission's role in consumer protection; to strengthen the Commission's power to address energy affordability; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999 chun go dtabharfar don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais (CRF) an sainchúram reachtach chun faireachán éifeachtach a dhéanamh ar phraghsanna mórdhíola agus miondíola sa mhargadh fuinnimh; do mhéadú mhinicíocht agus leibhéal an tuairiscithe; do dhéanamh faireachán agus rialáil éifeachtach ar chleachtais fálaithe; do neartú na gcumhachtaí atá ag an gCoimisiún chun faireachán a dhéanamh ar iompar frithiomaíoch soláthróirí gáis agus leictreachais; do leathnú an róil atá ag an gCoimisiún i gcosaint tomhaltóirí; do neartú na cumhachta atá ag an gCoimisiún chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar inacmhainneacht fuinnimh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009 to give the Comptroller and Auditor General oversight of RTÉ accounts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009 chun formhaoirsiú ar chuntais RTÉ a thabhairt don Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Craolacháin (Formhaoirsiú ar Chuntais RTÉ) (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Employment Equality (Pay Transparency) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Employment Equality (Pay Transparency) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998 to provide for pay transparency in the advertising of jobs.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le trédhearcacht pá le linn poist a fhógairt.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta (Trédhearcacht Pá), 2022

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision in relation to certain tenants’ obligations to pay rent in respect of dwellings used for accommodation during academic term times, to make provision in relation to the maximum period of notice required by such tenants to terminate a tenancy, to oblige certain landlords to refund relevant payments in certain circumstances relating to Covid-19, for those purposes to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le hoibleagáidí de chuid tionóntaí áirithe cíos a íoc i leith teaghaisí a úsáidtear le haghaidh cóiríochta le linn amanna an téarma acadúil, do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil leis an tréimhse fógra uasta a cheanglaíonn tionóntaí den sórt sin a thabhairt chun tionóntacht a fhoirceannadh, do chur oibleagáid ar thiarnaí talún áirithe íocaíochtaí iomchuí a aisíoc in imthosca áirithe a bhaineann le Covid-19, chun na gcríoch sin do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Residential Tenancies (Student Rents and Other Protections) (Covid-19) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Cíosanna agus Cosaintí Eile do Mhic Léinn) (Covid-19), 2021

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) Act 2015 relating to treatment of patients under the Mental Health Act 2001 and the Criminal Law (Insanity) Act 2006; to improve the provision of mental health services; to promote the rights of persons subject to the Mental Health Act 2001 and the Criminal Law (Insanity) Act 2006; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chinnteoireacht Chuidithe (Cumas), 2015 i ndáil le cóireáil a chur ar othair faoin Acht Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001 agus faoin Acht um an Dlí Coiriúil (Gealtacht), 2006; d’fheabhsú soláthar seirbhísí meabhairshláinte; do dhéanamh cearta daoine atá faoi réir an Achta Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001 agus an Achta um an Dlí Coiriúil (Gealtacht), 2006 a chur chun cinn; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Health (Exemption of Charges for Involuntary Psychiatric Patients) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health Act 1970 to exclude involuntarily detained psychiatric patients from any in-patient fees.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 1970 chun othair shíciatracha atá faoi choinneáil dá n-ainneoin a eisiamh ó aon táillí d’othair chónaithe.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Exemption of Charges for Involuntary Psychiatric Patients) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Díolúine ó Mhuirir d’Othair Shíciatracha Ainneonacha) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Mental Health (Capacity To Consent To Treatment) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Mental Health (Capacity to Consent to Treatment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to amend the Mental Health Act 2001 and for that purpose to provide for the right of minors over the age of 16 to consent to mental health treatment and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001 agus chun na críche sin do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceart mionaoiseach atá os cionn 16 bliana d'aois toiliú le cóireáil mheabhairshláinte agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Mental Health (Capacity To Consent To Treatment) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Meabhair-Shláinte (Cumas Toiliú le Cóireáil), 2018

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: Second Stage
Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit conversion therapy, as a deceptive and harmful act or practice against a person's sexual orientation, gender identity and, or gender expression.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc teiripe thiontúcháin mar ghníomh nó cleachtas meabhlach agus dochrach in aghaidh gnéaschlaonadh, féiniúlacht inscne agus/nó léiriú inscne duine.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thoirmeasc ar Theiripí Tiontúcháin, 2018

debates.showAs: Arts (Dignity at Work) (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable the Arts Council to ensure that funding is contingent on compliance with employment law and for that purpose to amend the Arts Act 2003; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú don Chomhairle Ealaíon a chinntiú go mbeidh maoiniú ag brath ar an dlí fostaíochta a bheith á chomhlíonadh agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Ealaíon, 2003; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Ealaíon (Dínit ag an Obair) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2018

debates.showAs: National Asset Management Agency (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the National Asset Management Agency Act 2009 and the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 to empower NAMA and the Ireland Strategic Investment Fund to contribute to the stability of the housing system through the provision of social and affordable housing
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta fán nGníomhaireacht Náisiúnta um Bainistíocht Sócmhainní, 2009 agus an Achta um Ghníomhaireacht Bainistíochta an Chisteáin Náisiúnta (Leasú), 2014 chun a chumhachtú do GNBS agus don Chiste Infheistíochta Straitéisí d'Éirinn rannchuidiú le cobhsaíocht an chórais tithíochta trí thithíocht shóisialta agus incheannaithe a sholáthar
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fán nGníomhaireacht Náisiúnta um Bainistíocht Sócmhainní (Leasú) 2017
